Packages that use ColumnViewer
Package
Description
org.eclipse.compare.structuremergeviewer
Provides support for finding and displaying the differences between hierarchically structured data.
org.eclipse.jface.databinding.viewers
Provides classes that can be used to observe the JFace Viewer framework.
org.eclipse.jface.viewers
Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for SWT widgets.
org.eclipse.ui.dialogs
Classes for standard dialogs, wizards, and preference pages in the Eclipse Platform User Interface.
org.eclipse.ui.navigator
Provides the Common Navigator framework.
org.eclipse.ui.views
Application programming interfaces for interaction with and extension of the Eclipse Platform User Interface.
org.eclipse.ui.views.markers
Utility classes for working with markers in views
 
org.eclipse.ui.views.properties
Provides the standard Property Sheet view which displays custom properties of the active workbench part's current selection.

    Description
    class 
    DiffTreeViewer
    A tree viewer that works on objects implementing the IDiffContainer and IDiffElement interfaces.
    class 
    StructureDiffViewer
    A diff tree viewer that can be configured with a IStructureCreator to retrieve a hierarchical structure from the input object (an ICompareInput) and perform a two-way or three-way compare on it.

    ContainerCheckedTreeViewer
    CheckboxTreeViewer with special behaviour of the checked / gray state on container (non-leaf) nodes: The grayed state is used to visualize the checked state of its children.
